title: Norway Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Norway decreased to 287.54 percent in 2021 from 328.58 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Norway averaged 255.73 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 328.58 percent in 2020 and a record low of 196.50 percent in 1996. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
